title: Average living space of PRH tenants Hong Kong 2007 to 2019
yAxis: Average living space in square meters per person
summary: Overall Average living space in square meters per person has increased over the Year.
Average living space in square meters per person is slightly increasing from 2009 to 2017, and finally roughly constant from 2017 to 2019.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2009 and 2012.
The highest Average living space in square meters per person, of value 13.3 was reached at Year 2018, and 2019
The lowest Average living space in square meters per person, of value 12.5 was reported at Year 2009
min_summary: In general Average living space in square meters per person has rose over the Year.
